response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. Given its high value to you, I propose a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that is worth $15,000 to you at a discounted rate. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
